abstract: Maine Gov Paul R LePage, combative and intemperate, has alienated almost entire Legislature, including fellow Republicans and former allies; has partaken in name calling and vetoed many bills, which Legislature has overridden and is expected to veto state's $6.7 billion budget, which is also expected to be overridden; there is talk of impeachment.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Paul R. LePage of Maine has generated a bipartisan backlash in the Legislature, and even talk of impeachment, with a rough style and a flurry of vetoes.

headline.main: Combative Maine Governor Becomes a Party of One
headline.print_headline: Combative Governor Becomes a Party of One

snippet: Gov. Paul R. LePage of Maine has generated a bipartisan backlash in the Legislature, and even talk of impeachment, with a rough style and a flurry of vetoes.
